errors.2003: Insert a customized error message here.

confirm.title: Warning
confirm.message: This will deactivate the publisher. Continue?
confirm.success: The publisher has been deactivated successfully.

trustanchor.absent: There is no embedded Trust Anchor configured
trustanchor.sure: Are you sure? You typically only need this in test and development situations.

form.rsync_uri_format: Rsync URI must have a format of: rsync://host/module/<path>
form.rrdp_uri_format: RRDP notify URI must have a format of: https://host/<path>
